Interface NodeSchedulerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClassifierNodeScheduler, ExtractorNodeScheduler, NodeScheduler, OptimizerNodeScheduler, ProcessorNodeScheduler, TrainerNodeScheduler, ValidatorNodeScheduler
public interface NodeSchedulerInterface

All node schedulers should implement this interface
